home.welcome-text: My name is Liv. Welcome to my laboratory, where time and space collide. I have been a journalist, have learnt a few languages and now I spend most of my time coding. You will find my written pieces in the archive room and my coding projects if you scroll down a bit down the lab. If you don't want to wander around, you can take a shortcut on the left and go straight ahead to my resume. You can leave a message. Enjoy your time here.
